A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This review has gone from 4 stars to 1. The movie on it’s own is much better than 1\, but it’s story is the bruise on the apple. It’s true. It ruins it’s heritage and passes on a destroyed story to the conclusion. From the Phantom Menace to eight\, you see the rise and fall of Aniken and Luke. The kicker was the last 5 episodes of the Y7 Star Wars Rebels show. Rebels gave us that magical feeling while making it still have a gut punch of a main character death. No way TLJ should trash the center of the joy for the last 40 years. At least in the prequels you knew Luke was on his way.
